title: How Russell reacted to Verstappen - Mercedes rumours at Silverstone
summary: George Russell says his chances of leaving Mercedes at the end of the year are "exceptionally low"

qa_pairs.question: Which team does George Russell currently drive for in Formula 1?
What was George Russell's reaction regarding rumors of leaving Mercedes?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He stated that his chances of leaving are exceptionally low.
wrong_options: He confirmed he will leave Mercedes.
He has not thought about it.

qa_pairs.question: As of 2023, who is the reigning World Champion in Formula 1?
